Gisborne roads to convert from sealed to unsealed amid budget cuts https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-roads-to-convert-from-sealed-to-unsealed-amid-budget-cuts/DLVKWVQN75HVNNZX3J3HB4TQ2Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-roads-to-convert-from-sealed-to-unsealed-amid-budget-cuts/DLVKWVQN75HVNNZX3J3HB4TQ2Y/ Zita Campbell, Local Democracy ReporterPolicy needed as Gisborne council plans unsealed roads; public meetings to discuss impact. Fri, 08 Nov 2024 04:00:00 +0000 Mata Rd, pictured in 2020, could have sections of its lower end reverted to an unsealed condition according to Gisborne District Council plans. It is on a list of 86 sealed roads within Gisborne city and along the East Coast a report says have deteriorated to such an extent that it would be more beneficial to either revert the road or parts of it to an unsealed state or to resurface it with a cost-effective chip seal coating. Photo / Gisborne District Council Facebook page
